job.title: Lead Software Engineer
job.description: Are you a Lead-level Software Engineer looking for a hands-on role with a growing company? Are you currently working with Java on the back-end and modern JavaScript for UI Development? Would you like to work with the most cutting-edge technologies for up to $170K Salary, a 10% bonus and UNLIMITED PTO per year? Then keep reading! Our client is a unique and innovative organization who have a fantastic opportunity for a Lead Software Engineer to join their expanding team. You will be empowered to use your creativity and flair to make a real difference from your first day.  What you’ll need? FULL STACK capability – both front and back-end experienceMust be hands on with Java8Worked with JavaScript in the last yearExperience with React and or Angular What you’ll get in return: Up to $170K Salary10% annual bonus – for all your hard work401K planPrivate healthcare planCompany stock options availableUnlimited remote workingUNLIMITED PTO per year  What to do next? Apply directly via the link below or send me a message on LinkedIn!
